```
package main

import "fmt"

func main() {
        s1 := make([]int, 3, 5)
        copy(s1, []int{1, 2, 3})
        fmt.Println(len(s1), cap(s1), &s1[0])

        s1 = append(s1, 4)
        fmt.Println(len(s1), cap(s1), &s1[0])

        s2 := s1[1:]
        fmt.Println(len(s2), cap(s2), &s2[0])
} 
```
